title: Customer Redeems Loyalty Reward
description: A loyalty member has enough points for a $5 discount and wants to apply it to their purchase.

tasks.description: At checkout, the associate looks up the customer's loyalty account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The loyalty account is linked to the transaction.

tasks.description: The POS displays the customer's available rewards, including a '$5 Off' coupon.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate sees the reward the customer is eligible for.

tasks.description: The associate applies the $5 reward to the transaction, which deducts the points from the customer's account and reduces the sale total.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer successfully redeems their reward, and their points balance is updated.
